title: “Recreation Ground” (R
clause_text: “Recreation Ground” (R.G.) shall mean, any common open space required to be kept in any layout and left permanently open to the sky, having access from any public pathway or public road.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: “Recreation Ground” (R.G.) shall mean, any common open space required to be kept in any layout and left permanently open to the sky, having access from any public pathway or public road.
